text: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۖ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا مُفۡتَرُونَ

translation.en: And to 'Aad [We sent] their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. You are not but inventors [of falsehood]
translation.id: Dan kepada kaum 'Ād (Kami utus) saudara mereka, Hud. Dia berkata, "Wahai kaumku! Sembahlah Allah, tidak ada tuhan bagimu selain Dia. (selama ini) kamu hanyalah mengada-ada
